Package pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TextTransformerInterface
    This is the interface, which declares the transform method for TextTransformer objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TextTransformerAbbreviate  
    TextTransformerCapitalize
    This class decorates a TextTransformerInterface with an added implementation of the "capitalize" transform.
    TextTransformerDecorator
    This is the abstract decorator class, which defines the decoratedTransformer member to provide a nested structure for TextTransformerInterfaces.
    TextTransformerEscape  
    TextTransformerInverse
    This class decorates a TextTransformerInterface with an added implementation of the "inverse" transform.
    TextTransformerLower
    This class decorates a TextTransformerInterface with an added implementation of the "lower" transform.
    TextTransformerNumerals  
    TextTransformerStandsFor  
    TextTransformerTrim
    This class decorates a TextTransformerInterface with an added implementation of the "trim" transform.
    TextTransformerUpper
    This class decorates a TextTransformerInterface with an added implementation of the "upper" transform.
